T02D3541:180b-1: shr'i ma na ma h'a k'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3541:180b-3: dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3541:180b-4: dpal ldan mgon po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3541:180b-5: de bzhin du sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas stong
T02D3541:180b-6: pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la sna tshogs padma dang
T02D3541:180b-7: nyi ma la h'um yig nag po /
T02D3541:180b-8: de yongs su gyur pa las dpal ldan rje btsun nag po chen po phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3541:180b-11: spyan gsum pa 'bar ba chen po //
T02D3541:180b-12: phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D3541:180b-13: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa /
T02D3541:180b-14: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3541:180b-15: mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D3541:180b-16: sku thams cad la sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o /
T02D3541:180b-18: zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3541:180b-20: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3541:180b-23: yungs kar rnams kyis nag po chen po'i spos phul
T02D3541:180b-24: nas sran ma sha dang 'dzum bu ti ka dang
T02D3541:180b-25: chang dang me tog dang byug pa lnga'i lcags kyu'i
T02D3541:180b-26: bdud rtsis nag po chen po mchod pa bya ste
T02D3541:180b-28: aom ma h'a k'a l'a ya sh'a sa no pa
T02D3541:180b-29: k'a ri nam ae sh'a pashtsi ma ka lo aa
T02D3541:180b-30: yam aidam ratna tra y'a pa k'a ri nam ya
T02D3541:180b-31: di pra ti dzny'am sma ra si ta d'a ai
T02D3541:180b-32: dam dushta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi ma ra
T02D3541:180b-33: ma ra grihna grihna bandha bandha /
T02D3541:180b-37: d'i na me ke na m'a ra ya h'um h'um
T02D3541:180b-38: phat phat tsha ba gsum gyis bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas
T02D3541:180b-39: te lus la tsher mas dgang zhing dug dang ske
T02D3541:180b-40: tshe rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du byugs nas me
T02D3541:180b-42: gang gi ming dang bcas pa de //
T02D3541:180b-43: de bzhin skad cig mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D3541:180b-44: slob dpon zhe sdang rtag khro gang //
T02D3541:180b-45: gang zhig dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02D3541:180b-46: dpag med sems can rnams 'tshe rnams //
T02D3541:180b-47: nag po chen pos za bar byed //
T02D3541:180b-48: de yi lus la sha gcod cing //
T02D3541:180b-49: de bzhin khrag ni 'thung bar byed //
T02D3541:180b-50: spyi bor thig le byas nas gus pa rgya chen po byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
